data.title: 2mm DBA Light Cavalry 40x30mm 3d models
data.meta_description: l➤ 2mm DBA Light Cavalry 40x30mm 3d models ✅. Cavalry figures for 2mm Napoleonic Battles. These strips are 1 horse deep. ...I've included strips appropriate for 20mm, 30mm, and 40mm bases.
data.text:
DBA 3.0 2mm Figure bases

thingiverse

Some bases I designed for a travel version of DBA. Bases have a space in the bottom for a 5mm x 1mm magnet. Commander base has a small hole for a flag so you can quickly identify where they are! Also, each back corner has a square you can paint to...

Never Mind the Billhooks Cavalry Movement Tray for DBA Cavalry Base

thingiverse

A movement tray designed for cavalry in Never Mind the Billhooks, converting a DBA cavalry base. ...Can hold one 60mmX40mm DBA cavalry base plus one 25mmX50mm base for a total of 4 horses.

15mm Basque Light Cavalry

myminifactory

15mm version of the Basque light cavalry. The riders and javelins are a single piece, horses and shields are still separate. ...***be careful removing supports from delicate areas such as horse reigns and tail and legs, so use clippers!**

Bookmark - Light Cavalry Sabre

prusaprinters

A simple bookmark that shows a 1796 Pattern Light Cavalry Troopers' Sabre on the outer face and which uses a fin to separate a book's pages. ...An easy print, this sword is amongst some of the most well-loved by military history enthusiasts and gained a...

Barbarian Light Cavalry

thingiverse

Can be used for wargaming for formations of massed cavalry. No scale, choose your own. I do recommend minimum of 40mm height. Otherwise the weapons might not print correctly. Always check the layering in your slicer for defects! Made for use...

2mm Cavalry Blocks -- Ancients and Medieval

thingiverse

2mm scale Cavalry figures for wargaming in Ancients and Medieval periods. They are present in traditional Blocks.They could, in theory, work for other eras such as Napoleonics, but I designed them for Ancients and Medieval. There are Small, Medium,...

$6.00War Sister Light Cavalry

myminifactory

Battle Sister Light Cavalry This set includes:- Battle Sister Light Cavalry (Full and Modular)- Weapon Sword (Modular)- 1x Base All of them unSupported and Pre-Supported (You can also find this model in our April 2021 Monthly Release, in the Monthly...

$25.0015mm Basque Light Cavalry

myminifactory

15mm Basque/Christian Light Cavalry. 8 riders, 4 horses, 1 shield. *** all files come pre-supported ONLY**** otherwise, i recommend you buy the 28mm ones and scale them down to 52% if you prefer unsupported files. However the Javelins will come as...
